MyCC
====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which MyCC installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using MyCC, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load MyCC/2017-03-01-intel-2019b-Python-2.7.16
```
